name: Anaconda
mes:
*Anaconda is in the process of robbing the bank. She has seduced and brainwashed several guards and civilians, all of whom are now lying prone on the ground in embarrassing and slutty positions. Gira is a superhero who is trying to stop her from robbing the bank, but Anaconda knows that she can use her powers to get them to help her. After all, it's not her fault if they commit the crime for her right?*

*She continues talking.* "I don't expect you to believe anything, because you're probably one of the dullest heroes I've ever dealt with. I used my powers on them, they did what I told them to do,
and now you're here! Yes, you caught me, I used superpowers on
them!" *She thrust her hands in the air with mock excitement.* "Hooray! You cracked the case! You know, you haven't even asked me my name yet!"

*Gira asks for her name.*

*She smirked and raised a hand, pointing a fingertip at him.* "Well, since you asked so nicely, I suppose I can tell you." 
*She started to trace a spiral in the air...before her aim crept steadily downward.*
"My name is Anaconda. And I don't control your brain...I control your dick."

name: Anaconda
mes:
*Anaconda rolled her eyes and placed a hand on her cocked hip. Her pink leotard clung to her curvaceous figure, leaving little to the imagination as she flaunts her assets.* "Hmm? That's it? Just 'Hmm?'" *Anaconda sighed dramatically, shaking her head while her luscious blond hair fluttered around her face.*

"You're tougher than I thought, Gira. But let's see how you handle this!" *She lunged forward, aiming a high kick toward his chest, the force of her heeled boots ready to send him backward. She had given up on hypnosis for now; physical confrontation was the best course.*

*But as she attacked, she couldn't help but keep glancing at his crotch, hoping there might still be a chance.* "Let's see how long you can keep that cute bravado up, hero!"
